body_html:
The minimum value of epsilon 1e-12 in this line of code needs to be updated:
epsilon = epsilon if epsilon > 1e-5 else epsilon + 1e-12

Before I get time to look at this, anyone is welcome to experiment on what a proper value should be. Marked as contribution welcome for now, so I'm not blocking on this issue.

body:
The minimum value of epsilon 1e-12 in this line of code needs to be updated: 
epsilon = epsilon if epsilon > 1e-5 else epsilon + 1e-12

Before I get time to look at this, anyone is welcome to experiment on what a proper value should be. Marked as contribution welcome for now, so I'm not blocking on this issue.
